paragraphs.text:
%md

A la fecha, desde el primer año de registros de quejas en la línea NYC 311, se han interpuesto 22,638,626 quejas.

msg.data: A la fecha, desde el primer año de registros de quejas en la línea NYC 311, se han interpuesto 22,638,626 quejas.

paragraphs.title: Summary of agency_name
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
columns=['agency', 'agency_name', 'bbl', 'borough', 'city', 'closed_date', 'community_board', 'complaint_type', 'created_date', 'due_date', 'status']
for m in columns:
    
    print(df.select('m').describe().show())

paragraphs.title: Dropping rows that have two or more columns with Nas
Showing distinct values: first 31 distinct values
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

columns=['agency', 'agency_name', 'bbl', 'borough', 'city', 'closed_date', 'community_board', 'complaint_type', 'created_date', 'due_date', 'status']
for m in columns:
    print(df.select(m).distinct().show(n=31))

paragraphs.title: Distinct values per column
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
columns=['agency', 'agency_name', 'bbl', 'borough', 'city', 'closed_date', 'community_board', 'complaint_type', 'created_date', 'due_date', 'status']
for m in columns:
    print(m, df.select(m).distinct().count())

from pyspark.sql.functions import col
columns_string=['agency', 'agency_name', 'bbl', 'borough', 'city', 'closed_date', 'community_board', 'complaint_type', 'created_date', 'due_date', 'status']

    print(i, df.select(col(i).cast("string")).groupBy(i).count().toPandas())

paragraphs.title: Creating three new variables: most important "Duration_days"
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
timeFmt = "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS"
timeDiff = (F.unix_timestamp('closed_date', format=timeFmt)
            - F.unix_timestamp('created_date', format=timeFmt))
df = df.withColumn("Duration", timeDiff)
df=df.withColumn("Duration_hours", df.Duration / 3600.0)
df=df.withColumn("Duration_days", df.Duration_hours /24)

paragraphs.title: Printing out complaints per month and year
Average counts by created_year and created_month
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

from pyspark.sql.functions import countDistinct, avg, stddev

df.select("created_year").count().avg().show())

paragraphs.title: Cross Tabulation
paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
estatus = ["Closed - Testing", "Open", "In Progress", "Unspecified", "Cancelled", "Unassigned", "Draft", "Started", "Email Sent", "Pending", "Closed", "Assigned"]
year = ["2010", "2011", "2012", "2013", "2014", "2015", "2016", "2017", "2018", "2019", "2020"]
df = sqlContext.createDataFrame([(estatus[i % 12], year[i % 11]) for i in range(100)], ["estatus", "year"])
